holidays.name: New Year's Day
holidays.description: New Year’s Day is the first day of the year, or January 1, in the Gregorian calendar.

holidays.name: Restoration of the Czech Independence Day
St. Valentine's Day
holidays.description: Valentine’s Day is a special time to celebrate love, romance and friendship.

holidays.name: Carnival / Ash Wednesday
holidays.description: Ash Wednesday marks the first day of Lent in western Christian churches.

holidays.name: Palm Sunday
holidays.description: Palm Sunday is a Christian feast that commemorates Jesus Christ’s entry into Jerusalem. It is also the start of Holy Week.

holidays.name: Maundy Thursday
holidays.description: Maundy Thursday is a Christian observance on the Thursday during Holy Week. It is the day before Good Friday.

holidays.name: Good Friday
holidays.description: Good Friday is a global Christian observance two days before Easter Sunday.

holidays.name: Holy Saturday
holidays.description: Holy Saturday is the day before Easter Sunday.

holidays.name: Easter Sunday
holidays.description: Easter Sunday commemorates Jesus Christ’s resurrection, according to Christian belief.

holidays.name: Easter Monday
holidays.description: Easter Monday is the day after Easter Sunday.

holidays.name: Labor Day / May Day
holidays.description: May Day, or Labor Day, is a day off for workers in many countries around the world.

holidays.name: Mother's Day
holidays.description: Mother’s Day celebrates the achievements and efforts of mothers and mother figures.

holidays.name: Ascension Day
holidays.description: Ascension Day is the 40th day of Easter. It is a religious holiday that commemorates the ascension of Jesus Christ into heaven.

holidays.name: Whit Sunday
holidays.description: Many Christians all over the world annually observe Pentecost, also known as Whitsunday or Whit Sunday.

holidays.name: Whit Monday
holidays.description: Whit Monday, or Pentecost Monday, is a Christian holiday that falls on the day after Pentecost, which is also known as Whit Sunday or Whitsunday.

holidays.name: Trinity
holidays.description: Trinity Sunday is the first Sunday after Pentecost.

holidays.name: Father's Day
holidays.description: Father’s Day celebrates fatherhood and male parenting on different dates worldwide.

holidays.name: Struggle for Freedom and Democracy Day
Christmas Eve
holidays.description: Christmas Eve is the day before Christmas Day and falls on December 24 in the Gregorian calendar.

holidays.name: Christmas Day
holidays.description: Christmas Day is one of the biggest Christian celebrations and falls on December 25 in the Gregorian calendar.
